title: Java Script
content: JavaScript is a widely-used programming language primarily used for web development. It is a versatile and powerful language that enables interactive and dynamic behavior on websites.

title: CSS
content: Cascading Style Sheets (CSS) is a simple mechanism for adding style (e.g., fonts, colors, spacing) to Web documents.

title: HTML
content: The HyperText Markup Language or HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.
